description: This file defines an API client module for interacting with a backend server in a React project. It includes configuration for the API base URL, error normalization, and exported functions for setting authorization tokens and making API requests.

methods.name: getApiBaseUrl()
methods.description: Returns the configured API base URL, defaulting to 'http://localhost:4000'.

methods.name: normalizeApiError(err)
methods.description: Normalizes various backend/axios error formats into a consistent { message, status, data } shape.

methods.name: setApiAuthToken(token)
methods.description: Sets or clears the Bearer token in the shared axios instance headers.

methods.name: apiRequest(config)
methods.description: Performs an API request with error normalization, returning the response data or throwing a normalized error.
